name: Statue Defender
detailed_description:
Your statue is under attack. Hope is a distant glimmer in the fog, fading fast with every passing moment.
This is no fight for a glorious victory, but a desperate fight for survival.
Everything important is at stake, the continuous existence of your favorite statue and your life. If you fail the ground will be painted red by your blood and covered in shiny rubble of metal from the most glorious statue ever to have existed.
You need to fight to keep the statue from falling and not be able to fulfill the world for all eternity.

Monsters
Many different kinds of enemies and bosses.
Each enemy have a chance to become unique with special names and powers.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR HERO
Gain skill points when leveling up and use them to improve your hero stats.
It’s up to you to decide the best way to spend your skills points to survive the constantly shifting tide of battle.
Try a new build every time you play to find the best one.

Content:
More then 30 unique waves of enemies.
Five boss waves.
Four different heroes to choose from with their own unique set of active and passive abilities.
Countless of combination to customize your character stats when leveling up.
No easter egg to search for.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel i5, 2.4 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated HD Graphics 520 w/128 MB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
